bug.author: seriouslyez
bug.summary: Did not auto detect external IP
bug.description: This occurred right after I upgraded streamlit to version 0.52.1. This happens every time I try to run streamlit. The below error resulted from running streamlit hello in a docker container. Did not auto detect external IP. Please go to <denchmark-link:https://streamlit.io/docs/>https://streamlit.io/docs/</denchmark-link> for debugging hints. ('EXCEPTION!', AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'strip'",)) File "/usr/local/bin/streamlit", line 8, in sys.exit(main()) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/click/core.py", line 764, in return self.main(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/click/core.py", line 717, in main rv = self.invoke(ctx) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx)) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/click/core.py", line 956, in invoke return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/click/core.py", line 555, in invoke return callback(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/streamlit/cli.py", line 194, in main_hello _main_run(filename) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/streamlit/cli.py", line 260, in _main_run bootstrap.run(file, command_line, args) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/streamlit/bootstrap.py", line 226, in run ioloop.start() File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tornado/ioloop.py", line 1017, in start self._run_callback(self._callbacks.popleft()) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tornado/ioloop.py", line 758, in _run_callback ret = callback() File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tornado/stack_context.py", line 300, in null_wrapper return fn(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tornado/gen.py", line 326, in wrapper yielded = next(result) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/streamlit/server/Server.py", line 343, in _loop_coroutine traceback.print_stack(file=sys.stdout)

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/seriouslyez>@seriouslyez</denchmark-link> , I've just tried with new docker container with ubuntu 18.04 and it's working fine for me, do you have the steps to replicate this?

So I thought this happened because I upgraded streamlit to 0.52.1. However, when I tested this on my ubuntu image 18.04 outside the docker it works fine. Within docker, I tried downgrading back to 0.50.2 but I received the same error, even when trying to run streamlit hello, let alone running my own file.

I have the same error when I am connected to the internet using my home internet router. And also when I am not connected to the internet. If I am connected to the internet via my phone using a wifi hotspot streamlit works. I am running on Docker Ubuntu 18.04. Why does connecting to a different network change streamlit if I am running locally?

Looks like another instance of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/554>#554</denchmark-link>
Marking as dupe. Please reopen if you think this is not correct.
